property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this spell from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ Attack Chance: Light dispector (When one of your light dispectors attacks, you may cast this spell for no cost.) ■ Choose up to 3 of your opponent's creatures and tap them. They don't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Dragon from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.
